summary: Saw it. Loved it. Couldnt get it. Here you go.
descriptionHtml:
There is already an almost identical mod on Steam (Steam exclusive) All it does is replace the sound Fx of goats when they lose their humble lives with that of a "Screaming goat" Completely unlore-friendly. But you know what? Since when do chickens explode? <3 Oh the humor. I'm so funny.
I don't hate goats? What? I swear.
It's just funny as hell.
Basically, my router doesn't have the correct ports for Steam to work. And it's not my router. For those of you have similar issues, here you go bitches. Screaming goat deaths. I used no previous authors files. Obviously. I can't get them. But KUDOS to "SorenBC" over at Steam for such ridiculous and brilliant idea. Drag, drop, kill, laugh.
****My next plan is "Fainting Goats" ;D*********
author: ttroudt13
